page.title: 15 The Milkman.
page.content: He is a Unigate milkman and his depot is at Wool. He has to get up very early to deliver the milk. Sometimes I'm still in bed when he comes and I can hear the bottles rattle as he walks up the garden path. He has to stop his milk float many times when he is delivering the milk. He sells lots of other things such as,butter,cheese,cream,eggs,bread, potatoes,real fruit juice,different flavoured yoghurts,apple juice,orange juice,coke,lemonade,soda water and ginger beer. You can buy from him,Christmas hampers, turkey, chickens, bacon and ham. In the springtime he was selling bags of peat. He collects money for a Christmas Club.
